headline: Intuitive Surgical Reveals New FDA-Cleared Features Driving Innovation In da Vinci 5
summary: On Friday, Intuitive Surgical Inc. (NASDAQ:ISRG) unveiled the first set of new software capabilities for its da Vinci 5 surgical system, which is aimed at boosting surgeon performance and hospital efficiency. The upgrades introduce new system capabilities on da Vinci 5, including Force Gauge, In-Console Video Replay and Network CCM. The company said da Vinci 5 offers more than 10,000 times the computing power of its predecessor, da Vinci Xi, enabling real-time surgical insights and advanced feat

headline: Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) Unveils New Software Upgrades for da Vinci 5 Platform
summary: Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) recently unveiled new software capabilities for its da Vinci 5 system, receiving FDA clearance, at the Intuitive 360 forum. While these advancements represent a significant leap in surgical technology, the company's stock performance over the last week was essentially flat, showing a modest 0.29% move. This aligns with the broader market trends, which also saw only slight fluctuations amid mixed results across major indexes. Higher gains in tech stocks generally...

headline: Intuitive adds new real-time insights to da Vinci 5 robot
summary: Intuitive’s da Vinci 5 is said to have 10,000 times the computing power of its the original da Vinci Xi, which dates back to 2014.

headline: Intuitive Introduces Real-Time Surgical Insights for da Vinci 5
summary: New Force Gauge, In-Console Video Replay, and Network CCM features designed for enhanced efficiencySUNNYVALE, Calif., Sept. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Intuitive (Nasdaq: ISRG), a global technology leader in minimally invasive care and the pioneer of robotic-assisted surgery, today announced the first in a series of new software capabilities for da Vinci 5, designed to enhance surgeon and hospital efficiency through the delivery of a range of real-time surgical insights.
